price: 13. Dan milik-Nyalah segala apa yang ada pada malam dan siang hari. Dan Dialah Yang Maha Mendengar, Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: ۞ وَلَهُۥ مَا سَكَنَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walahu mā sakana fī al-layli wal-nahāri wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
